bk1.GetAllDays: select distinct substr(to_char(date_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),0,10) from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName sg_dev_acline_h_icinglive_{{0}} UNION select distinct substr(to_char(date_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),0,10) from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName sg_dev_dcline_h_icinglive_{{0}}

bk.GetAcList: select i.line_id,l.name,t1.towerno,t2.towerno,i.reporter,v.name,i.icing_type,'' as sjbh,i.icing_thickness,'' as sf,i.date_time from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_h_icinglive_{{0}} i join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_b l on i.line_id=l.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower t1 on l.id=t1.line_id and i.st_tower_id=t1.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower t2 on l.id=t2.line_id and i.end_tower_id=t2.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_voltagetype v on l.voltage_type=v.code WHERE i.date_time>={1} and i.date_time<{2}
bk.GetDcList: select i.line_id,l.name,t1.towerno,t2.towerno,i.reporter,v.name,i.icing_type,'' as sjbh,i.icing_thickness,'' as sf,i.date_time from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_h_icinglive_{{0}} i join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_b l on i.line_id=l.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_r_tower t1 on l.id=t1.line_id and i.st_tower_id=t1.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_r_tower t2 on l.id=t2.line_id and i.end_tower_id=t2.tower_id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_voltagetype v on l.voltage_type=v.code WHERE i.date_time>={1} and i.date_time<{2}
bk.GetAllDays: select distinct substr(to_char(date_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),0,10) from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_h_icinglive_{{0}} UNION select distinct substr(to_char(date_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'),0,10) from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_h_icinglive_{{0}}

ROOT.GetLineStat: SELECT DCLOUD_ID,0,0,COUNT(1) AS C FROM (SELECT DCLOUD_ID,FILETIME from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_ICING_INFO where DCLOUD_ID is not null and FILETIME<{1} AND dateadd(d,1,filetime)>{0} AND FORECASTDAYONE IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(FORECASTDAYONE)>0 AND FORECASTDAYONE>0.0 UNION SELECT DCLOUD_ID,FILETIME from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_ICING_INFO where DCLOUD_ID is not null and dateadd(d,1,FILETIME)<{1} AND dateadd(d,2,FILETIME)>{0} AND FORECASTDAYTWO IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(FORECASTDAYTWO)>0 AND FORECASTDAYTWO>0.0 UNION SELECT DCLOUD_ID,FILETIME from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_ICING_INFO where DCLOUD_ID is not null and dateadd(d,2,FILETIME)<{1} AND dateadd(d,3,FILETIME)>{0} AND FORECASTDAYTHREE IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(FORECASTDAYTHREE)>0 AND FORECASTDAYTHREE>0.0 UNION SELECT DCLOUD_ID,FUTURETIME FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameHN_FORECASTINVERSION_INFO A JOIN (SELECT DCLOUD_ID AS DEVID,FUTURETIME AS FTIME,MAX(FILETIME) AS MAXTIME FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameHN_FORECASTINVERSION_INFO WHERE DCLOUD_ID IS NOT NULL AND FUTURETIME>={0} AND FUTURETIME<{1} GROUP BY DCLOUD_ID,FUTURETIME) M ON A.DCLOUD_ID=M.DEVID AND A.FUTURETIME=M.FTIME AND A.FILETIME=M.MAXTIME WHERE DCLOUD_ID IS NOT NULL AND FUTURETIME>={0} AND FUTURETIME<{1} ) GROUP BY DCLOUD_ID
ROOT.GetLineStatEx: SELECT DCLOUD_ID,POLESTARTID||'',POLEENDID||'' from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_ICING_INFO where DCLOUD_ID is not null and FILETIME<{1} AND dateadd(d,1,filetime)>{0} AND FORECASTDAYONE IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(FORECASTDAYONE)>0 AND FORECASTDAYONE>0.0 UNION SELECT DCLOUD_ID,POLESTARTID||'',POLEENDID||'' from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_ICING_INFO where DCLOUD_ID is not null and dateadd(d,1,FILETIME)<{1} AND dateadd(d,2,FILETIME)>{0} AND FORECASTDAYTWO IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(FORECASTDAYTWO)>0 AND FORECASTDAYTWO>0.0 UNION SELECT DCLOUD_ID,POLESTARTID||'',POLEENDID||'' from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_ICING_INFO where DCLOUD_ID is not null and dateadd(d,2,FILETIME)<{1} AND dateadd(d,3,FILETIME)>{0} AND FORECASTDAYTHREE IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(FORECASTDAYTHREE)>0 AND FORECASTDAYTHREE>0.0 UNION SELECT DCLOUD_ID,POLEID,POLEID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameHN_FORECASTINVERSION_INFO A JOIN (SELECT DCLOUD_ID AS DEVID,FUTURETIME AS FTIME,MAX(FILETIME) AS MAXTIME FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameHN_FORECASTINVERSION_INFO WHERE DCLOUD_ID IS NOT NULL AND FUTURETIME>={0} AND FUTURETIME<{1} GROUP BY DCLOUD_ID,FUTURETIME) M ON A.DCLOUD_ID=M.DEVID AND A.FUTURETIME=M.FTIME AND A.FILETIME=M.MAXTIME WHERE DCLOUD_ID IS NOT NULL AND FUTURETIME>={0} AND FUTURETIME<{1}
ROOT.GetLightCountP: select region,region,count(1) c FROM (SELECT DCLOUD_ID,SUBSTR(PROVINCE,0,2) AS REGION from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_ICING_INFO where DCLOUD_ID is not null and FILETIME<{1} AND dateadd(d,1,filetime)>{0} AND FORECASTDAYONE IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(FORECASTDAYONE)>0 AND FORECASTDAYONE>0.0 UNION SELECT DCLOUD_ID,SUBSTR(PROVINCE ,0,2) from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_ICING_INFO where DCLOUD_ID is not null and dateadd(d,1,FILETIME)<{1} AND dateadd(d,2,FILETIME)>{0} AND FORECASTDAYTWO IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(FORECASTDAYTWO)>0 AND FORECASTDAYTWO>0.0 UNION SELECT DCLOUD_ID,SUBSTR(PROVINCE ,0,2) from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_ICING_INFO where DCLOUD_ID is not null and dateadd(d,2,FILETIME)<{1} AND dateadd(d,3,FILETIME)>{0} AND FORECASTDAYTHREE IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(FORECASTDAYTHREE)>0 AND FORECASTDAYTHREE>0.0 UNION SELECT DCLOUD_ID,SUBSTR(PROVINCE,0,2) FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameHN_FORECASTINVERSION_INFO A JOIN (SELECT DCLOUD_ID AS DEVID,FUTURETIME AS FTIME,MAX(FILETIME) AS MAXTIME FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameHN_FORECASTINVERSION_INFO WHERE DCLOUD_ID IS NOT NULL AND FUTURETIME>={0} AND FUTURETIME<{1} GROUP BY DCLOUD_ID,FUTURETIME) M ON A.DCLOUD_ID=M.DEVID AND A.FUTURETIME=M.FTIME AND A.FILETIME=M.MAXTIME WHERE DCLOUD_ID IS NOT NULL AND FUTURETIME>={0} AND FUTURETIME<{1} ) a group by region order by c desc
ROOT.GetLightAllTime: SELECT FILETIME,DCLOUD_ID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_ICING_INFO WHERE FILETIME<{1} AND dateadd(d,1,filetime)>{0} AND FORECASTDAYONE IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(FORECASTDAYONE)>0 AND FORECASTDAYONE>0.0 UNION SELECT FILETIME,DCLOUD_ID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_ICING_INFO WHERE dateadd(d,1,FILETIME)<{1} AND dateadd(d,2,FILETIME)>{0} AND FORECASTDAYTWO IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(FORECASTDAYTWO)>0 AND FORECASTDAYTWO>0.0 UNION SELECT FILETIME,DCLOUD_ID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_ICING_INFO WHERE dateadd(d,2,FILETIME)<{1} AND dateadd(d,3,FILETIME)>{0} AND FORECASTDAYTHREE IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(FORECASTDAYTHREE)>0 AND FORECASTDAYTHREE>0.0 UNION SELECT FUTURETIME,DCLOUD_ID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameHN_FORECASTINVERSION_INFO A JOIN (SELECT DCLOUD_ID AS DEVID,FUTURETIME AS FTIME,MAX(FILETIME) AS MAXTIME FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameHN_FORECASTINVERSION_INFO WHERE DCLOUD_ID IS NOT NULL AND FUTURETIME>={0} AND FUTURETIME<{1} GROUP BY DCLOUD_ID,FUTURETIME) M ON A.DCLOUD_ID=M.DEVID AND A.FUTURETIME=M.FTIME AND A.FILETIME=M.MAXTIME WHERE DCLOUD_ID IS NOT NULL AND FUTURETIME>={0} AND FUTURETIME<{1} ORDER BY FILETIME DESC
ROOT.GetLineTower: select alarm_tower,alarm_tower,alarm_time,longitude,latitude,distence,region from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_COM_MOUNTAIN_H_FIREALARM_2022 where alarm_line={0} AND alarm_time>={1} and alarm_time<{2} UNION ALL select alarm_tower,alarm_tower,alarm_time,longitude,latitude,distence,region from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameSG_COM_MOUNTAIN_H_FIREFORECAST_2022 where alarm_line={0} AND alarm_time>={1} and alarm_time<{2} AND alarm_time>=sysdate
ROOT.GetLineWarn: SELECT FILETIME,POLESTARTID||'',POLEENDID||'',FORECASTDAYONE,FORECASTDAYTWO,FORECASTDAYTHREE FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_ICING_INFO WHERE DCLOUD_ID={0} and FILETIME<{2} AND dateadd(d,1,filetime)>{1} AND FORECASTDAYONE IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(FORECASTDAYONE)>0 AND FORECASTDAYONE>0.0 UNION SELECT FILETIME,POLESTARTID||'',POLEENDID||'',FORECASTDAYONE,FORECASTDAYTWO,FORECASTDAYTHREE FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_ICING_INFO WHERE DCLOUD_ID={0} and dateadd(d,1,FILETIME)<{2} AND dateadd(d,2,FILETIME)>{1} AND FORECASTDAYTWO IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(FORECASTDAYTWO)>0 AND FORECASTDAYTWO>0.0 UNION SELECT FILETIME,POLESTARTID||'',POLEENDID||'',FORECASTDAYONE,FORECASTDAYTWO,FORECASTDAYTHREE FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameALARM_ICING_INFO WHERE DCLOUD_ID={0} and dateadd(d,2,FILETIME)<{2} AND dateadd(d,3,FILETIME)>{1} AND FORECASTDAYTHREE IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(FORECASTDAYTHREE)>0 AND FORECASTDAYTHREE>0.0 UNION SELECT FUTURETIME,POLEID,POLEID,VALUE,NULL,NULL FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameHN_FORECASTINVERSION_INFO A JOIN (SELECT FUTURETIME AS FTIME,MAX(FILETIME) AS MAXTIME FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameHN_FORECASTINVERSION_INFO WHERE DCLOUD_ID={0} AND FUTURETIME>={1} AND FUTURETIME<{2} GROUP BY FUTURETIME) M ON A.FUTURETIME=M.FTIME AND A.FILETIME=M.MAXTIME WHERE DCLOUD_ID={0} AND FUTURETIME>={1} AND FUTURETIME<{2} ORDER BY FILETIME DESC
